divs: sighting details just finished dinner with workmates,walking to carthrough carpark,out of the corner of my eye i saw something about the same timeas everyone else,it was 2 orange\yellow oval shapes coming from thesouth,slowing down together in the sky, stopped almost above us then slowly theone in the west turned 90degrees, paused, then together they shot out to theeast accelerating faster than anything known should, in size they were each atleast coke bottle top size, there were reports a week later on the local radioand mydate has a 5 day error margin(sorry)
Summary: 2 orange oval lights in parallel, slowed,stopped,t
trends: There have been no other sightings in Babbie
